group_1.textLeft: Princess, we're back.
Woah... What's with this lump of charcoal...?@Did your synthesis fail again...?
As you can see, I've kinda lost track@of how many times I've done this.

group_1.textRight: You've been trying to hone your unique magic faster,@but it's not working out, huh...?

group_1.textLeft: Honestly, it sucks...
I was able to use my synthesis to transfer your@unique magic to Shigurin.
I'd like to be able to synthesize with objects too,@but...

group_1.textRight: You haven't been able to get synthesis to work on@them...
...We bought the ingredients to make curry.@What should we do with these...?

group_1.textLeft: I was thinking about giving cooking with synthesis@a whirl.
I dunno anymore, though...
I totally wasted your time.@I'm sorry...

group_1.textRight: It just means we'll have to cook it normally later,@so it's okay.
Besides, going shopping let us get a look at how@Kamihama is doing.

group_1.textLeft: Oh yeah, what are the Tokime girls and the other@groups up to?
You think they figured out that this cutie@is actually alive?

group_1.textRight: No, as far as everyone else knows,@they still think you're dead.

group_1.textLeft: That's hella great for me, then!
Maybe I'll ask the Instructor if there's a point in@staying holed up at this place.

group_1.textRight: ...It sounds like you're basically sleeping over here@all the time...
Won't your parents or school get on your case@about that...?

group_1.textLeft: Nah, my parents pretty much let me do whatevs.
Plus the school this cutie goes to@offers online classes.
So it's all okie-dokie!★

group_1.textRight: I see...@I guess it's fine, then...

group_1.textLeft: Aww, were you worried about me, Shigurin?@You're too sweet, kyaha!★

group_1.textRight: Th-that's not what I...
Oh, more importantly, we've got big news...!
We heard...Promised Blood and the Union are gonna@have their final battle!
Y-yes, that's right!
Even though the others and I have been in hiding too,@we should start getting ready.

group_1.textLeft: Something about hearing that@gets me totally stoked!
I'm gonna fall behind if I don't get serious.
I can't make curry without a li'l bit of synthesizing!

group_1.textRight: Huh?@Princess, wait, it's just going to blow up agai...

group_1.textLeft: Hi-YAH!

group_1.textRight: ...There it goes.

group_1.textLeft: I guess enthusiasm isn't gonna cut it...
Princess?!

group_1.textRight: Wha-what's going on?!

group_1.textLeft: Ahh, my bad, I bet that was loud.@No biggie, though! It's fine!

group_1.textRight: I thought we were under attack!
...And the floor...!
Looks like there's quite the mess of food...@I'm not sure I want to ask what happened.

group_1.textLeft: Sorry, Instructor.
I screwed up trying to synthesize some curry.
But Hiko says that trial and error is important.
You should cut me some slack.

group_1.textRight: I was going to, but I can't just sit by and watch this@anymore...
I can't let the Community Center be desecrated@any more than it already has been.
From here on out,@I will personally help you train your magic.

group_1.textLeft: Thankies!★
But Instructor, your special training is, like,@super hard...
Please be gentle with me, okay?

group_1.textRight: Well, I suppose I don't have a choice...
